QueryList.Join: <%if(has(lastUpdateDateTime)){%> AND lastUpdateDateTime=:lastUpdateDateTime <%}%> <%else if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_not)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime <> :lastUpdateDateTime_not <%}%> <%else if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_li)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime like '%'||:lastUpdateDateTime_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_gt)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime>:lastUpdateDateTime_gt <%}%> <%else if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_ge)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime>=:lastUpdateDateTime_ge <%}%> <%if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_lt)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime<:lastUpdateDateTime_lt <%}%> <%else if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_le)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime<=:lastUpdateDateTime_le <%}%> <%if(has(logicStatus)){%> AND logicStatus=:logicStatus <%}%> <%else if (has(logicStatus_not)){%> and A.logicStatus <> :logicStatus_not <%}%> <%else if (has(logicStatus_li)){%> and A.logicStatus like '%'||:logicStatus_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(logicStatus_gt)){%> and A.logicStatus>:logicStatus_gt <%}%> <%else if (has(logicStatus_ge)){%> and A.logicStatus>=:logicStatus_ge <%}%> <%if (has(logicStatus_lt)){%> and A.logicStatus<:logicStatus_lt <%}%> <%else if (has(logicStatus_le)){%> and A.logicStatus<=:logicStatus_le <%}%> <%if(has(address)){%> AND address=:address <%}%> <%else if (has(address_not)){%> and A.address <> :address_not <%}%> <%else if (has(address_li)){%> and A.address like '%'||:address_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(idCard)){%> AND idCard=:idCard <%}%> <%else if (has(idCard_not)){%> and A.idCard <> :idCard_not <%}%> <%else if (has(idCard_li)){%> and A.idCard like '%'||:idCard_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(sex)){%> AND sex=:sex <%}%> <%else if (has(sex_not)){%> and A.sex <> :sex_not <%}%> <%else if (has(sex_li)){%> and A.sex like '%'||:sex_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(sex_gt)){%> and A.sex>:sex_gt <%}%> <%else if (has(sex_ge)){%> and A.sex>=:sex_ge <%}%> <%if (has(sex_lt)){%> and A.sex<:sex_lt <%}%> <%else if (has(sex_le)){%> and A.sex<=:sex_le <%}%> <%if(has(origin)){%> AND origin=:origin <%}%> <%else if (has(origin_not)){%> and A.origin <> :origin_not <%}%> <%else if (has(origin_li)){%> and A.origin like '%'||:origin_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(remark)){%> AND remark=:remark <%}%> <%else if (has(remark_not)){%> and A.remark <> :remark_not <%}%> <%else if (has(remark_li)){%> and A.remark like '%'||:remark_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(pic)){%> AND pic=:pic <%}%> <%else if (has(pic_not)){%> and A.pic <> :pic_not <%}%> <%else if (has(pic_li)){%> and A.pic like '%'||:pic_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(createDateTime)){%> AND createDateTime=:createDateTime <%}%> <%else if (has(createDateTime_not)){%> and A.createDateTime <> :createDateTime_not <%}%> <%else if (has(createDateTime_li)){%> and A.createDateTime like '%'||:createDateTime_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(createDateTime_gt)){%> and A.createDateTime>:createDateTime_gt <%}%> <%else if (has(createDateTime_ge)){%> and A.createDateTime>=:createDateTime_ge <%}%> <%}%> <%else if (has(phone_not)){%> and A.phone <> :phone_not <%}%> <%else if (has(phone_li)){%> and A.phone like '%'||:phone_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(tenantId)){%> AND tenantId=:tenantId <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantId_not)){%> and A.tenantId <> :tenantId_not <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantId_li)){%> and A.tenantId like '%'||:tenantId_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(tenantId_gt)){%> and A.tenantId>:tenantId_gt (has(position_ge)){%> and A.position>=:position_ge <%}%> <%if (has(position_lt)){%> and A.position<:position_lt <%}%> <%else if (has(position_le)){%> and A.position<=:position_le <%}%> <%if (has(orderby)) {%> ORDER BY A.${orderby} <%if (has(sort)){%> ${sort} <%}else{%> ASC <%}%> <%}%>
